thread.title: Leonardo DiCaprio Considering Film About VW Emissions Scandal
thread.title_full: Leonardo DiCaprio Considering Film About VW Emissions Scandal

title: Leonardo DiCaprio Considering Film About VW Emissions Scandal
text:
Leonardo DiCaprio Considering Film About VW Emissions Scandal Posted just a moment ago 
Taylor Hill/WireImage (LOS ANGELES) -- Leonardo DiCaprio may produce a film based on the current Volkswagen scandal. 
The actor's production company, along with Paramount, have acquired the rights to a book proposal by Jack Ewingon the subject, according to The Hollywood Reporter . 
Volkswagen, the largest carmaker in the world, is accused by regulators of using illegal "defeat device" software that causes 482,000 of its diesel cars in the U.S. to cheat on emissions standards tests. 
No word on when the film may hit theaters.
